query: SELECT id, title, is_diptych, panel_count, description FROM prints WHERE is_diptych = 1 OR panel_count > 1 OR description LIKE '%triptych%' OR description LIKE '%diptych%'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user RXsnsHaxFXFzWXK.root --database TGNsMbsGdWXQhRmCtYbG6q --execute SELECT id, title, is_diptych, panel_count, description FROM prints WHERE is_diptych = 1 OR panel_count > 1 OR description LIKE '%triptych%' OR description LIKE '%diptych%'

rows.title: The Subject of Paint
rows.description: Abstract artwork featuring soft pinks, corals, and greens with organic forms

rows.title: Tiefenschwarz
rows.description: Striking diptych featuring fragmented abstract forms with blues, yellows, purples, and pinks on black. Sold as a two-piece set.

rows.title: Candyflip
rows.description: A striking diptych featuring deep navy blue with scattered pink, white, and purple splatter patterns creating a cosmic, ethereal effect across two panels.
